title: Torrent, Crack and Serial Search Gadget for Windows Vista Sideba
description:
This is my second custom Google Search Engine Gadget that finds torrents, cracks or serials from your desktop Sidebar in Windows Vista. It shouldn&#039;t have any problems working on XP also. First select either a torrent, a crack or a serial to search for. Then, simply put the title of the software, movie, game, etc in the search box, and it&#039;ll find what your looking for from the most common torrent and crack sites- Mininova, ThePirateBay, ScrapeTorrent, GameCopyWorld and Serials.ws to name a few.

This gadget opens Google.com in your defualt browser, to display your search results. No other popups, annoyances or scamming. Please feel free to leave comments. Tell me what you like and dislike, and if it doesn&#039;t work please let me know.

I am seeding, even if the site says there aren&#039;t any seeds.

If it doesn&#039;t automatically install:
1.Simply copy ?%userprofile%AppDataLocalMicrosoftWindowsSidebarGadgets? and paste in Windows explorer address bar.

2. When you get to that folder Copy and Paste the ?TorrentCrackSerial.Gadget? folder there.

3. Add it to the sidebar from your sidebar gallery.

As always, enjoy and checkout http://www.yourdealing.com/vistagadgets/ for updates and othe Vista Sidebar Gadgets.
Cheers!
